trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> event is raised when the data in an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> changes.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> property indicates the index of the item that was added, changed, or deleted.

If an item was moved, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> property indicates the new location of the item and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex%2A> property indicates the old location.
If only one item is affected by a change, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex%2A> property value is -1.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs"></xref> class given the type of change and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> affected.
This constructor can be used only if the schema of the object has changed.

The `listChangedType` parameter should be <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.PropertyDescriptorAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.PropertyDescriptorChanged>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.PropertyDescriptorDeleted>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType"></xref> value indicating the type of change.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that was added, removed, or changed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs"></xref> class given the type of change and the index of the affected item.
Use this constructor if only one item is affected by a change.
In this case, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex%2A> property is set to -1.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType"></xref> value indicating the type of change.
The index of the item that was added, changed, or removed.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs"></xref> class given the type of change, the index of the affected item, and a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> describing the affected item.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType"></xref> value indicating the type of change.
The index of the item that was added or changed.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> describing the item.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs"></xref> class given the type of change and the old and new index of the item that was moved.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType"></xref> value indicating the type of change.
The new index of the item that was moved.
The old index of the item that was moved.
Gets the type of change.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType"></xref> value indicating the type of change.
Gets the index of the item affected by the change.
For items that have been moved, this property represents the new location of the item.
The index of the affected by the change.
Gets the old index of an item that has been moved.
The old index of the moved item.
Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that was added, changed, or deleted.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> affected by the change.
